page.title: 15TRADE: KENNELS IN WESTFIELD
page.content: Foxley Boarding Kennels is on the outskirts of Westfield and they can take up to 24 dogs and 32 cats at one time. The busiest time for the kennels and cattery is in the summer (from July to September). They keep their animals in a big garden in individual kennels. The cats and dogs are kept separate to each other. They change the animals' bedding every other day and they walk them twice a day. The kennels have been there for 4 years but the owners now have only been there for 6 months. There are no other employees who work at the kennels except their daughter and their son who sometimes lend a hand. Other than that they do everything themselves. All rates are daily. If a pet is removed before noon then no charge for that day will be made.
